languages.text: "На мостик, немедленно! Если Эдельтрад там, значит, ему нужна помощь". {n}Абеляр поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Знаете, {name}, что меня действительно тревожит? Вокс-трансляции Лорд-капитана. Они не прекращаются, хотя Леди Теодоре сейчас самое место — на мостике, во главе контрудара... Неспокойно мне. А если Вольного Торговца осадили в собственных палатах? С вашего дозволения — давайте удостоверимся, что это не так. Мы можем воспользоваться тем же подъемником, к которым ушли Леди Теодора и Морт".

traits.locale_text: "На мостик, немедленно! Если Эдельтрад там, значит, ему нужна помощь". {n}Абеляр поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Знаете, {name}, что меня действительно тревожит? Вокс-трансляции Лорд-капитана. Они не прекращаются, хотя Леди Теодоре сейчас самое место — на мостике, во главе контрудара... Неспокойно мне. А если Вольного Торговца осадили в собственных палатах? С вашего дозволения — давайте удостоверимся, что это не так. Мы можем воспользоваться тем же подъемником, к которым ушли Леди Теодора и Морта".

languages.text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

languages.text: “去舰桥！如果艾德萨德在那边，那我们需要立刻进行救援。”{n}阿贝拉德转向了你。{/n}“不得不说，{name}，有件事情让我极为不安。舰长大人的音阵信息依然在不断传来。虽说西奥多拉夫人此刻有可能就在舰桥上，指挥船员抵抗入侵者，这样的情况也能说得通……可我仍然感到很不安。万一舰长大人在她自己的房间里遭到了伏击，该怎么办？如果您允许的话，我建议我们亲自确认她的安危。我们可以利用西奥多拉夫人与莫特之前乘坐的电梯前往。”
languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

traits.locale_text: “去舰桥！如果艾德萨德在那边，那我们需要立刻进行救援。”{n}阿贝拉德转向了你。{/n}“不得不说，{name}，有件事情让我极为不安。舰长大人的音阵信息依然在不断传来。虽说西奥多拉夫人此刻有可能就在舰桥上，指挥船员抵抗入侵者，这样的情况也能说得通……可我仍然感到很不安。万一舰长大人在她自己的房间里遭到了伏击，该怎么办？如果您允许的话，我建议我们亲自确认她的安危。我们可以利用西奥多拉夫人与莫特之前乘坐的电梯前往。”

languages.text: «¡Al puente! Si Edelthrad está allí, necesitará refuerzos de inmediato». {n}Abelard se gira hacia ti.{/n} «{name}, hay algo que me preocupa por encima de todo lo demás: las transmisiones por voco de la Lord Capitán. Si siguen llegando, a pesar de que lo lógico sería que lady Theodora estuviera ahora mismo en el puente, liderando el contraataque... me inquietan ciertas posibilidades. ¿Y si la Lord Capitán se encuentra bajo asedio en sus propios aposentos? Con su permiso, sugiero que confirmemos personalmente que ese no es el caso. Podemos usar el mismo ascensor al que se dirigieron antes lady Theodora y Mort».
languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

Si siguen llegando, a pesar de que lo lógico sería que lady Theodora estuviera ahora mismo en el puente, liderando el contraataque... me inquietan ciertas posibilidades. ¿Y si la Lord Capitán se encuentra bajo asedio en sus propios aposentos? Con su permiso, sugiero que confirmemos personalmente que ese no es el caso. Podemos usar el mismo ascensor al que se dirigieron antes lady Theodora y Mort».

languages.text: 「ブリッジへ出陣！エデルスラドがブリッジにいるなら、すぐに助けが必要だ」{n}アベラルドは、あなたのほうを向く。{/n}「申し上げなければならないことがあります、{name}様。我が最も厄介だと思うのは、ロード・キャプテン様のヴォクスキャストです。たとえシオドーラ様が今ブリッジの上、船の先頭で反撃をしているのは理に適っているとしても…我は心配です。もし、ロード・キャプテン様がご自身の部屋にいて外から敵に包囲されているとしたら？あなた様の許可を得て、あの方が包囲されていないことを我らの目で確認することをご提案致します。シオドーラ様が先ほどモートと一緒に向かったのと同じエレベーターを使えます」
languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

traits.locale_text: 「橋へ出陣！エデルスラドが橋にいるなら、すぐに助けが必要だ。」 {n}アベラルドはあなたのほうを向く。{/n} 「申し上げなければならないことがあります。{name}私が最も厄介だと思うのは、ロード・キャプテンのヴォクスキャストです。たとえレディ・テオドラが今橋の上、船の先頭で反撃をしているのは理に適っているとしても…私は心配です。もし、ロード・キャプテンがご自身の部屋にいて外から敵に包囲されていたとしたら？あなた様の許可を得て、彼女が包囲されていないことを我々の目で確認することをご提案致します。レディ・テオドラが先ほどモートと一緒に向かったのと同じエレベーターを使えます」

「ブリッジへ出陣！エデルスラドがブリッジにいるなら、すぐに助けが必要だ」{n}アベラルドは、あなたのほうを向く。{/n}「申し上げなければならないことがあります、{name}様。我が最も厄介だと思うのは、ロード・キャプテン様のヴォクスキャストです。たとえシオドーラ様が今ブリッジの上、船の先頭で反撃をしているのは理に適っているとしても…我は心配です。もし、ロード・キャプテン様がご自身の部屋にいて外から敵に包囲されているとしたら？あなた様の許可を得て、あの方が包囲されていないことを我らの目で確認することをご提案致します。シオドーラ様が先ほどモートと一緒に向かったのと同じエレベーターを使えます」

languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, , there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

languages.text: « À la passerelle ! Si Edelthrad s'y trouve, il aura besoin de notre aide. » {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Dites-moi, {name}, il y a quelque chose qui me dérange tout particulièrement. Les transmissions-vox de la seigneure-capitaine... Nous continuons à les recevoir, alors qu'en toute logique, dame Théodora devrait actuellement se trouver sur la passerelle, à la tête de la contre-attaque... J'ai un mauvais pressentiment. Et si la seigneure-capitaine était acculée dans ses propres quartiers ? Si vous le voulez bien, je suggère d'aller vérifier par nous-mêmes que ce n'est pas le cas. Nous pouvons utiliser le même ascenseur que dame Théodora et Mort ont pris un peu plus tôt. »
languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

traits.locale_text: « À la passerelle ! Si Edelthrad s'y trouve, il aura besoin de notre aide. » {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Dites-moi, {name}, il y a quelque chose qui me dérange tout particulièrement. Les transmissions-vox de la seigneure-capitaine... Nous continuons à les recevoir, alors qu'en toute logique, dame Théodora devrait actuellement se trouver sur la passerelle, à la tête de la contre-attaque... J'ai un mauvais pressentiment. Nous pouvons utiliser le même ascenseur que dame Théodora et Mort ont pris un peu plus tôt. »

languages.text: "Zur Brücke! Falls Edelthrad dort ist, braucht er sofortige Unterstützung." {n}Abelard wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "{name}, eine Sache beunruhigt mich doch sehr. Die Vox-Übertragungen des Lord Captain. Sie kommen immer noch, obwohl Lady Theodora jetzt eigentlich auf der Brücke sein müsste, um den Gegenangriff zu leiten ... Ich habe ein ungutes Gefühl. Was ist, wenn der Lord Captain in seinem eigenen Quartier belagert wird? Mit Eurer Erlaubnis schlage ich vor, dass wir uns selbst davon überzeugen, dass dem nicht so ist. Wir können denselben Aufzug benutzen, zu dem Lady Theodora und Mort vorhin unterwegs waren."
languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

traits.locale_text: "Zur Brücke! Falls Edelthrad dort ist, braucht er sofortige Unterstützung." {n}Abelard wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "{name}, eine Sache beunruhigt mich doch sehr. Die Vox-Übertragungen des Lord Captain. Sie kommen immer noch, obwohl Lady Theodora jetzt eigentlich auf der Brücke sein müsste, um den Gegenangriff zu leiten ... Ich habe ein ungutes Gefühl. Was ist, wenn der Lord Captain in seinem eigenen Quartier belagert wird? Mit Eurer Erlaubnis schlage ich vor, dass wir uns selbst davon überzeugen, dass dem nicht so ist. Wir können denselben Aufzug benutzen, zu dem Lady Theodora und Mort vorhin unterwegs waren."

languages.text: "Köprüye! Edelthrad oradaysa acil yardıma ihtiyacı vardır." {n}Abelard, sana dönüyor.{/n} "{name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, bir şey var ki beni ziyadesiyle tedirgin ediyor: Lord Kaptan'ın voks yayınları. Leydi Theodora'nın şu an köprüde ve karşı saldırının başında olması gerek ama yayınlar hâlâ durmadı. İçim rahat değil. Ya Lord Kaptan kendi odasında kuşatılmışsa? İzninizle bizzat gidip durumunu teyit etmemizi öneririm. Leydi Theodora ile Mort'un kullandığı asansörü kullanabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "To the bridge! If Edelthrad is there, then he requires immediate assistance." {n}Abelard turns to you.{/n} "I say, {name}, there is one thing that I find most troubling. The Lord Captain's vox-casts. They are still coming in, even though it would make sense for Lady Theodora to be on the bridge right now, at the head of the counter-assault... I feel uneasy. What if the Lord Captain is besieged in her own chambers? With your permission, I suggest that we confirm for ourselves that she is not. We can use the same elevator that Lady Theodora and Mort headed for earlier."

Edelthrad oradaysa acil yardıma ihtiyacı vardır." {n}Abelard, sana dönüyor.{/n} "{name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, bir şey var ki beni ziyadesiyle tedirgin ediyor: Lord Kaptan'ın voks yayınları. Leydi Theodora'nın şu an köprüde ve karşı saldırının başında olması gerek ama yayınlar hâlâ durmadı. İçim rahat değil. Ya Lord Kaptan kendi odasında kuşatılmışsa? İzninizle bizzat gidip durumunu teyit etmemizi öneririm. Leydi Theodora ile Mort'un kullandığı asansörü kullanabiliriz."
